wikipedia_page.main: Dan Suter (born 29 June 1993) is a Welsh rugby union player who plays for the Dragons regional team as a prop. He was also a Wales under-20 international.Suter made his debut for the Ospreys regional team in 2012 having previously played for the Ospreys academy, Bridgend Ravens, Aberavon RFC, Swansea RFC and Tonmawr RFC. He was released by the Ospreys at the end of the 2016–17 season.Suter joined the Dragons for the 2017–18 season.
